output: Capture an office worker with a sharply focused expression, dressed in comfortable yet professional clothing like rolled-up sleeves or a sweater over a collared shirt. This occurs on a mid-morning when natural light gently streams through the office windows, casting soft shadows across their determined face. Their setting is an open-plan office filled with desks lined up neatly and whiteboard walls adorned with progress charts. The scene exudes a sense of determination and productivity, reflecting an atmosphere where focus meets efficiency in bustling yet organized surroundings.
